mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pclassify_id AS "pclassifyId", a.product_name AS "productName", a.price AS "price", a.type AS "type", a.standard AS "standard", a.product_unit AS "productUnit", a.pfunction AS "pfunction", a.explains AS "explains", a.sales_num AS "salesNum", a.repertory_num AS "repertoryNum", a.status AS "status", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.standby1 AS "standby1", a.standby2 AS "standby2", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator", b.classify_name AS "classifyName"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_product a left join zhenghe_product_classify b on a.pclassify_id = b.id
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_product( id, pclassify_id, product_name, price, type, standard, product_unit, pfunction, explains, sales_num, repertory_num, status, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pclassifyId}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{type}, #{standard}, #{productUnit}, #{pfunction}, #{explains}, #{salesNum}, #{repertoryNum}, #{status}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zhenghe_product SET pclassify_id = #{pclassifyId}, product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, type = #{type}, standard = #{standard}, product_unit = #{productUnit}, pfunction = #{pfunction}, explains = #{explains}, sales_num = #{salesNum}, repertory_num = #{repertoryNum}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
